document.full_text: sen. john mccain and rep. peter king, who lost their last attempt to win a presidential pardon for the first black heavyweight champion, jack johnson, are looking for a rematch.
document.title: mccain, king resolution calls for pardoning boxer
lines_and_colors: sen. john mccain and rep. peter king, who lost their last attempt to win a presidential pardon for the first black heavyweight champion, jack johnson, are looking for a rematch.
